BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Stop retaining transport responses past serialization (#125163) (#126078) Remove the `OutboundMessage` class that needlessly holds on to the the response instances after they are not needed any longer. Inlining the logic should save considerably heap under pressure and enabled further optimisations. backport of #125163
